Game.Name: Super Star Soldier (Japan)
Game.plot: Overview:Super Star Soldier is the direct sequel to Star Soldier and part of a larger series of Hudson-published sci-fi shoot 'em ups released for the TurboGrafx-16. It was followed by Final Soldier and Soldier Blade. The game later made its way to the Wii's Virtual Console and the PlayStation Network.The player once again takes control of a spaceship as they fight waves of enemies in a vertical-scrolling shoot 'em up. There's multiple weapons the player can choose from, by collecting color-coded power-ups.Cheat: Cheat MenuFollowing code unlocks a cheat menu where you can mess with all the options for the game like level selection and enemy difficulty: Hold Run+Select before powering on the console, then press Left, II, Up, II, Right, II, Down, II, Left, I, Up, I, Right, I, Down, I, I+II x8, I+Select x8 at the title screen.
Game.Notes: The special attack squad, lead by the Mother Brain, has launched an all out invasion on Earth. Take your small-scale fighter, the Neo Caesar, with its arsenal of 4 regular weapons and 2 special weapons, and send them back where they belong! In addition to the Normal Game mode in this vertical-scrolling shooting game, there are 2-minute and 5-minute Time Attack modes and a mode where high-scores can be checked. Normal Game is made up of 8 different stages, and in each stage (except Stage 7), a boss awaits you at the end.
